name: Electro Pricing Tables Lite
author: King Rayhan

sections.description:
The Electro Pricing Tables Lite Plugin makes it easy to create and publish beautiful pricing tables and comparison tables on your WordPress site. You will be able to set up and publish your pricing table in no time.

Demos

WordPress.org Support

As this is the lite version of this plugin, the only support we offer through these forums is for bugs. Support for questions regarding modifying your pricing tables, writing custom CSS, etc is available for extra charge.
sections.installation:
For automatic installation:

  • The simplest way to install is to click on ‘Plugins’ then ‘Add New’ and type ‘Electro Pricing Tables Lite’ in the search field.
  • Click ‘Install Now’ and have Fun!

For manual installation:

  • Login to your website and go to the Plugins section of your admin panel.
  • Click the Add New button.
  • Under Install Plugins, click the Upload link.
  • Select the plugin zip file (electro-pricing-tables-lite.zip) from your computer then click the Install Now button.
  • You should see a message stating that the plugin was installed successfully.
  • Click the Activate Plugin link.

Installation from server:

  • You should have access to the server where WordPress is installed. If you don’t, see your system administrator.
  • Copy the plugin zip file (electro-pricing-tables-lite-xx.zip) up to your server and unzip it somewhere on the file system.
  • Copy the “easy-CountDowner” folder into the /wp-content/plugins directory of your WordPress installation.
  • Login to your website and go to the Plugins section of your admin panel.
  • Look for “Electro Pricing Tables Lite” and click Activate.
